description: In Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android, with all Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, in the coresight-tmc driver, a simultaneous read and enable of the ETR device after changing the buffer size may result in a Use After Free condition of the previous buffer.

product.name: Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel
